issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Hi guys, I have question about web admin(platform.axway.com), especially about push notifications. When I click Devices, I see, that I have 213 devices subscribed. Is there any chance to filter this devices by platform? Or display page numbers? Maybe allow user to set number of rows per page.
Another thing - is there a possibility to unsubscribe all devices at once? 
Thank you
fields.summary: Improve web admin interface - Push notifications

comments.body:
Hello!
Thanks for reaching out! It's not possible right now. We will add this feature in the future.
Regards,
Aminul Islam
